author: Staff Reporter
text:
Special camps would be organised in polling booths across the district for enrolment of new voters and making corrections in the electoral rolls on Sunday, Collector M. Ravikumar said in a statement on Friday.

Forms for inclusion, deletion, correction and transposition of entries in the electoral rolls would be received. Form 6 for enrolling as new voter, Form 7 for deletion, Form 8 for making modifications and Form 8 (A) for change of address within a constituency would be issued, he said. The voters could also verify whether their names were properly enrolled in the electoral rolls, which would be displayed in all booths, he said.
title: Special camps
